creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Piece of dark blue and red striped material. Broad red stripes ornamented with geometric figures of the type found on Caucasian rugs. Narrower stripes, alternating red and blue, and carrying geometric bands in yellow intervals, and flanked by thin lines of yellow, red and blue. Worn and discolored spots at one end. Vertical tear, mended.
title: Piece of material
